alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 10:14PM MST until December 01 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 10 inches along and east of Washington State Route 195...3 to 6 inches west of Washington State Route 195. * WHERE...Potlatch, Genesee, Tekoa, Uniontown, Plummer, La Crosse, Oakesdale, Moscow, Colfax, Pullman, and Rosalia. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 7 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions Wednesday and Wednesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Drifting snow is expected and could further complicate travel across the Palouse on Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
